title: Daily Review With Clay and Buck - Jul 27 2022
itunes:title: Daily Review With Clay and Buck - Jul 27 2022
description:
DOJ is apparently investigating former President Trump over January 6th. The government is trying to redefine a recession. Julie Kelly, author, political commentator and senior contributor to American Greatness. Rafael Mangual joins Clay & Buck in studio to talk about the problems with crime in America.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
